ca.ualberta.taskr.controllers

Class NavViewController

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.controllers.NavViewController

  • public class NavViewController

    NavViewController class. This Controller is responsible for powering the Hamburger menu that appears on the left hand side of the screen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NavViewController(android.support.design.widget.NavigationView navView, android.support.v4.widget.DrawerLayout drawerLayout, android.content.Context context)
      the constructor sets the controller to be minimized off to the side by default
